messages.text: Hey, did you reach home safely? 😊
Yesss, just got in bed 🛏️
Missing you already 🥺
Same here 💔 the day feels incomplete without your goodnight hug 😔
Aww stop it 😩 you're gonna make me cryy
Haha nooo crying not allowed 😅 only cuddles and smiles 🥰
You're too cute for your own good, you know that? 😘
I try 😎 but you win in the cute department every time 💯
Shut up 😤 don’t make me blush at 10:20 PM like a teenager
Too late, you’re already blushing 😉
Stop reading my mind 😫
I wish you were here right now...
I’d be holding your hand, playing with your hair, telling you how lucky I am 🥺❤️
Okay that’s it 😭 you’re the reason I can’t sleep without smiling
And you're the reason my heart feels full every night 💤
Why are you like this 😭💞
Because you make me soft 😩
Ughh you're not allowed to be this adorable after 10 PM
Oops, too late 😜
Okay, time to sleep now before we end up texting till 3 again 🥱
Fineee 😔 but only if you promise to dream about me
Always. Goodnight my love 💕
Goodnight jaan. I love you 😘
Goodnight. Take Care.
Bro where tf are you? 🧐
Relax baba, I’m literally 2 mins away 😭
You said that 20 mins ago also 😐
Ok but traffic was vibing today 😤
Just admit you overslept bro 😒
Okay fine 🙄 I may or may not have snoozed 5 alarms
One day I’ll drag you out of bed myself
Kinky 😏
SHUT UP 😭
But fr though, I’ll be there in 10. Got Red Bull and chips 🛒
You’re forgiven 😌
So what’s the plan after chai? Full chill mode or chaos? 🤔
Little bit of both. Start with chai, end with existential crisis 🫠
Our brand 😎
Also I found this meme that’s LITERALLY you 💀
Drop it. I’m ready to be violated 😭
*sends cursed meme*
Wow. I feel personally attacked and seen at the same time 😩
Best friend duties 💅
You’re the worst best friend ever. I love you 🫂
Love you too, idiot 🖤
Did you reach office safely?
Yeah mom, just sat down at my desk 🙂
Did you have breakfast or skipped it again?
I had a banana 😅
That's not breakfast, sweetheart 😒
I know, I’ll eat something proper soon. Promise ❤️
Please take care of your health. Work can wait.
I made your favorite stuffed flatbreads today by the way 😋
Ugh now I’m hungry again 😂 save me some please!
Always. I’ll warm it up when you’re home.
You're the best ❤️
Don’t forget to drink water. Seriously!
Drinking right now because you said so 😇
Good boy 🥰 now get back to work.
Okay mom. Talk later. Love you 😘
Love you too. Take care ❤️

name: Crushhhhhh
lastMessage: And what if I already have? 👀

messages.text: Hey stranger 👀
Do I know you?
Not yet. But that’s the plan 😉
Smooth. Is this how you talk to everyone?
Only the ones who look like they might ruin my sleep schedule 😅
Wow. Full-time flirt, part-time poet huh?
You noticed the poet part first. I'm taking that as a win 😎
Hmm… okay, I’ll admit. That was kinda clever.
Cleverness is my default mode. But I can switch to charming if needed 😏
Don’t push your luck 😅
Fair. How about I earn my luck instead?
That depends. What exactly are you trying to earn here?
Hmm, let’s start with a smile. Maybe later, a coffee. Long-term? Who knows 😇
You’re annoyingly good at this 😤
Blame it on the company. You bring out the best lines in me.
Okay fine. I *might* be smiling a little.
Mission accomplished ✅ but now I need to hear your laugh too. For science, of course.
😂 you’re literally impossible
And yet... here you are, still replying 👀
Yeah yeah whatever 🙄
That’s code for: I’m kinda enjoying this 😏
Maybe. Don’t let it go to your head tho.
Too late. Already thinking of what our couple name would be 😌
Omg stoppp 😂😂
Fine fine. But just so you know — you’re very hard *not* to like.
Okay okay stop before I start crushing back 😳
Oh? You weren’t already? That’s embarrassing for me 😅
Shut up 😂 I didn’t say I wasn’t
Aha! Victory is mine 🏆
Alright, flirting king. You win this round.
Let’s call it even. But next round? Over coffee?
Hmm... maybe. Send me your best meme and I’ll think about it 😉
*sends 3 elite memes within 0.5 seconds*
Okay wow. This man came prepared 😂
Always. Especially when it’s for someone worth it ✨
God you're dangerous 😩
Only if you fall for me 😈
And what if I already have? 👀
Hey, is this Ayaan?
Yeah, who’s this?
Oh sorry, wrong number!
No worries 👍

name: Bhendi
lastMessage: Say when and I’m THERE. Snacks, anime, chaos. Let’s gooo 👏🍿

messages.text: BROOO you watch anime right?!
BRO. I BREATHE anime 😤 what’s up??
I just finished *Seven Deadly Sins* AND I HAVE QUESTIONS
Say LESS. Meliodas is an OP short king and I respect him 😤🔥
LIKE HOW is he THAT powerful and still looks like he’s 12 😭
It’s the demon genes + plot armor combo 💀 also… Ban is GOATED.
BAN AND ELAINE >>> Romeo & Juliet 😤
FACTS. Also have you watched *Hunter x Hunter*?
I JUST DID!! Gon going full psycho in Chimera Ant arc??? GOOSEBUMPS 🥶
That transformation??? Peak rage. Also Meruem vs Netero?? 🫡🔥
That fight was straight-up ART 🎨 and then Komugi??? 😭
Tore me apart bro. I was not okay for days 🥲
Okay okay BUT... have you watched *JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure*??
YESSS. JoJo is pure chaos and I LIVE for it. Dio is ICONIC 😈
ZA WARUDO! TOKI WO TOMARE! ⏱️💥
Bro every JoJo pose is illegal in 17 countries 😂
And yet we ALL try them in front of the mirror 😤💅
Okay wait... have you seen *No Game No Life*?? Colors, genius vibes, god complex — everything I want 💖
YESSSS. Sora and Shiro are the ultimate sibling duo 🔥
They be winning wars with chess and trolling literal gods 😭
STILL MAD WE DIDN’T GET A SEASON 2 THO 😤
Fr bro. My soul is still waiting 💀
Okay last one: *BTOOOM!* Thoughts?
Underrated GEM. The whole Battle Royale + emotional trauma?? INSANE
Right?? Felt like Hunger Games but with bombs and actual psychology 👀
We seriously need to binge something together at this point 😤
Say when and I’m THERE. Snacks, anime, chaos. Let’s gooo 👏🍿

name: Pratima Gaihre
lastMessage: No problem. Good luck with the notes!

messages.text: Heyyy 👋 Do you have today's Physics notes? I had to leave early 😩
Yeah I have them. Want me to send the pics?
Omg yes please! You’re a lifesaver 😇
*sends 5 photos* Let me know if you can’t read any page.
Wow your handwriting is actually kinda cute 😏
Haha thanks, I guess. Just tried to keep it neat.
Do you always take notes this perfectly or just when I miss class? 👀
Nah, I take notes like this every day. Habit.
Hmm so reliable... dangerous combo 👀🫣
Lol anyway, let me know if you need the rest of the week too.
So serious all the time 😅 you ever chill or just live in study mode?
Haha just trying to stay on track. Boards aren’t gonna ace themselves 😅
Okay okay Mr. Focused 😤 don’t worry, I won’t distract you... much 😇
Appreciate it lol. Gonna get back to finishing today's assignments. Let me know if you need help with anything.
Alright, won’t bug you 😌 thanks again!
No problem. Good luck with the notes!

name: Classmate Jamal
lastMessage: We rise above this clown college one project at a time 🤝

messages.text: Bro tell me why college feels like it’s actively trying to kill my love for coding 😩
Because it IS 💀 3-hour lectures for theory and not even one decent project-based course.
Fr bro, they teaching C like it’s 1999. Meanwhile companies want React, Node, DevOps, AI, full-stack, and your soul 💀
Exactly 😭 I had to learn everything useful from YouTube and Reddit.
Same. Speaking of which — I wanna start a side project. Just for learning and portfolio. Got any ideas?

Yessir 💡 Few I’m thinking about:
1. Simple WhatsApp clone (UI + chats)
2. Resume builder web app
3. Real-time chat app using socket.io
4. AI image caption generator using Hugging Face
5. Personal habit tracker (React + Firebase)
Bro stop I need to steal all those 😭 the resume builder sounds actually useful
Yeah and you can go extra — add templates, export as PDF, and auto-LinkedIn parser maybe 🔥
Aight I’m sold. Let’s build that together or parallel?
Parallel for now, we’ll share pain later 😂
Bet. Also what skill are you focusing on rn? I feel like I keep jumping around.

Right now I’m doing:
- React deep dive
- Git/GitHub properly
- And brushing DSA just for interviews 😩
DSA is pain bro. I do 5 leetcode questions and suddenly I need a nap 😭
No fr, one medium-level tree question and I’m contemplating my life choices.
Lowkey I feel like college should just chill on outdated junk and teach us dev workflows, APIs, Git, deployment… you know, real world sh*t.
Facts. Bro we’re gonna graduate and still Google 'how to center a div' 💀
LMAO that’s eternal 😂 Anyway, we should make a Notion board and dump all these ideas.
I already made one, will share link. Let’s pick one and commit 1 hour daily.
Brooo this is why you’re top G. Let’s gooo 🚀
We rise above this clown college one project at a time 🤝
